title: FQHC Networks and Primary Care Associations
prompt: A cluttered desk in a modest office with stacks of files, a coffee mug, and a phone, morning light filtering through venetian blinds casting long shadows across scattered papers and handwritten notes. The scene captures the worn authenticity of a small nonprofit workspaceâ€”no styling, just the visual texture of sustained institutional work. Shot from above at a slight angle, emphasizing the accumulated weight of decades of organizational relationships, with a single hand reaching across the desk toward a folder, framed to suggest continuity and quiet responsibility rather than crisis or struggle.
